snippet: The Spanish police have arrested a man who they said racially insulted Barcelona defender Dani Alves by throwing a banana at him.
abstract: Spanish police arrest David Campayo Lleo for allegedly racially insulting Barcelona defender Dani Alves by throwing a banana at him; Campayo Lleo, who worked for home soccer team Villarreal, has reportedly been fired.
lead_paragraph: The Spanish police have arrested a man who they said racially insulted Barcelona defender Dani Alves by throwing a banana at him.
